title: Manage Well Cementing Job
description: A completions engineer supervises the cementing of a casing string to ensure it provides zonal isolation.

tasks.description: Verify the cement slurry has been mixed to the correct density and volume as per the design.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer confirms the slurry properties are on-spec before pumping.

tasks.description: Monitor the pumping pressure in real-time as the cement is pumped down the casing and up the annulus.
tasks.expected_outcome: The pressure is monitored to ensure it stays within safe limits and indicates good displacement.

tasks.description: After the job, run a cement bond log (CBL) to evaluate the quality of the cement seal behind the casing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The CBL is run and analyzed, confirming a good bond across the zone of interest.
